name: reversegeek
0:
”Alexa, tell reverse geek to reverse Johnny Bravo”
”Alexa, ask reverse geek to get the inverse of Johnny Bravo”
”Alexa, ask reverse geek to what is the reverse of Johnny Bravo”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reverse geek
des: This Alexa skill takes in any word or sentence and returns the reverse of it. For instance, if you say "Alexa, ask reverse geek to reverse cartwheel". Alexa will reply "The reverse of cartwheel is: leehwtrac" or if you say "Alexa, ask reverse geek to reverse Johnny Bravo is my favorite". Alexa will reply: "The reverse of Johnny Bravo is my favorite is: etirovaf ym si ovarB ynnhoJ"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
